content.p1: We offer a service for customizing and distributing system disks and images. It is a service that, at first glance, may seem like the same as the one offered by consulting companies, nothing more, as our service is characterized by simplicity and familiarity of use.
content.p2: To request our service, all you have to do is go to our web portal where, through a visual and user friendly interface (no advanced knowledge is required to use it), our users can choose the software (operating system, programs general purpose, drivers you may need, etc.) and hardware (mainly disk type: HDD, SSD, M.2, etc.).
content.p3: Shipping costs are always borne by us.

request.Title: Sol·licitud del disc
request.Text: Mitjançant la nostra eina web pots sol·licitar un disc personalitzat que s'adapti a les teves necesistats. Molts dels seleccionables són gratuïts.

build.Title: Muntatge del disc
build.Text: El nostre equip de professionals s'encarrega d'instal·lar i configurar el disc sol·licitat. És un procés de dureació variable (depén de les característiques de la sol·licitud).

send.Title: Enviament
send.Text: El disc s'envia a la direcció indicada durant la sol·licitud del disc. Les despeses d'enviament sempre corren a càrrec nostre.

confirmDelete.Title: Are you sure you want to delete the role?

provided-info.Title: Information you provide us
provided-info.P-1: To use some of our products and services, you must have an account, and to create one, you must provide us with certain information. Similarly, if you use our payment products and services, we cannot provide them to you without obtaining payment information. Basically, some information is needed if you want to use many of our products and services.

1.Label: Personal accounts
1.Text: If you create an account, you must provide us with some information so that we can offer you our services. This includes a display name; a username (e. g. @RoxieHart); a password; an email address or phone number; a date of birth; your display language; and unique third-party login information (if you choose this login method). You can also choose to share your location on your profile and tweets, and upload your address book to Twitter to help find people you may know. Your profile information, which includes your display name and username, is always public, but you can use your real name or pseudonym. And remember, you can create multiple Twitter accounts, for example, to express different parts of your identity, professional or not.

2.Label: Payment information
2.Text: To purchase, you must provide us with payment information, including your credit or debit card number, card expiration date, CVV code, and billing address. This data is never stored unencrypted and is not accessible to Plugandwork staff.

use-of-info.Title: Use of information provided
use-of-info.P-1: When you use our services, we collect information about how you use our services and generate statistics. We use this information to provide you with products and services, to help keep Plugandwork safer and more respectful for everyone, and more relevant to you. Information we collect:

1.Label: Technology
1.Text: We collect the operating system version, phone model, device differentiating features, system language, location, and demographic information. This allows us to make decisions such as which devices to test, and so on.

2.Label: IP address
2.Text: For security reasons, some actions, such as logins, store the IP address in order to know who performs those actions.

cookiesMessage.Title: Cookies notice
cookiesMessage.Message: This website uses cookies in order to function and to provide the best service. We also use them to collect statistics, you can disable them if you prefer.

brand.Title: We want to know about you
brand.MessageL1: We look forward to hearing from you whenever possible. Use our contact form to send us a message. You do not need to have a purchase on the web to use it.
brand.MessageL2: It usually takes a few days for us to answer you, but keep in mind that depending on your query, we may take longer.

notification.Title: Give us your opinion
notification.Description: We would like to know about your experience using this web. Leave us a comment!

close.DoShowAgain: Do you want to stop being asked about your opinion?

grand-opening.Title: Grand opening
grand-opening.Description: We inaugurate our service offering great discounts. Take advantage of them!

we-make-it-look-easy.Title: We make it look easy
we-make-it-look-easy.Description: We put a lot of effort in order to provide an intuitive and agile user interface.

all-from-home.Title: A 100% online service
all-from-home.Description: Request your records using the online tool found on this website. You don't have to pick up your record at any physical store, we will take care of bringing your record home for free.

customized-disks.Title: Customized disks
customized-disks.Description: Create your own disc from our inventory software. You don't have to install all your programs, we take care of everything.

any-device.Title: Accessible from anywhere
any-device.Description: Access your account using any web browser, from any device and from anywhere in the world. In addition, the website has been translated into three different languages.

business.Title: Service for businesses
business.Description: We offer special conditions for companies. If your company needs to request our services, you can do so through the web or you can contact us. We offer discounts, agility with procedures and confidence.

joel-campos.Description: I'm the Junior DevOps of the team. I take care of the maintenance and updating of the web application. I have experience with cloud computing services, programming languages ​​and methodologies.

iker-torres.Description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur auctor urna ac libero pretium, id sagittis augue aliquam. Mauris pulvinar viverra ligula at pellentesque.

juanjo-romero.Description: Activitats dirigides a analitzar, dissenyar, desenvolupar, instal·lar i mantenir programari d'aplicació prenent com a base els requeriments de l'usuari.

video.Title: Our service
video.Description: Find out what services we offer and how you can use the web to request them by watching this video. On the channel you will find many videos related to the service (news, news, updates, etc.).
